attributes.action: Call for a general election to allow the British people to choose who is PM.
attributes.additional_details:
Article 3 the right to hold fair and free elections to select a prime minister.

David Cameron's resignation should have triggered a free and fair election instead of a PM being chosen for us. 

With the lack of fair elections and denial of petitions the nations democratic rights have been denied.
attributes.background:
We the people of the UK wish to invoke article 3 and freely and fairly elect a PM chosen by the people. 
We elected David Cameron and not Theresa May. 
The conservatives had the right to pick a new leader but not a new PM which is ONLY the right of the nation.
